price: ‹ ߟߐ߲ߞߏߕߌ߮ › ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߒ ߡߴߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߒ ߞߴߌ ߕߍߣߊ߬ ߛߋ߫ ߡߎ߬ߢߎ߲ ߣߐ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߒ ߝߍ߬؟
arabic: قَالَ أَلَمۡ أَقُلۡ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ مَعِيَ صَبۡرٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qāla alam aqul innaka lan tastaṭīʿa maʿiya ṣabran
